## [[...embeddings:]{.embedding .bigger}](https://bookdown.org/jtkulas/9_16_25/9_16_25.html#/embeddings)

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%"}
### [Quarto:](https://quarto.org/docs/authoring/notebook-embed.html)

+ Use to isolate **selected elements** from within larger child project  
+ Also creates `.html` version of entire source child

```{r}
#| eval: false
#| echo: true

{{< embed example.qmd#numbers >}}
```

:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
### [iframe:](https://www.w3schools.com/tags/tag_iframe.asp)

+ Use to include entire child document: 

<iframe src="https://bookdown.org/jtkulas/9_16_25" width="100%" height="300px" frameborder="0"></iframe>
:::
